704748f-b.title: Brooklyn: Hamilton Avenue - Woodhull Street
704748f-b.text:
Hamilton Avenue, north from ''oodhull S-treet, showing demolition
for the construction of the Gowanus Parkway.
P. L. Sperr  January 10, 1941
NO REPPODUCTIN  Views 11,2,3

704747f-c.title: Brooklyn: Hamilton Avenue - Woodhull Street
704747f-c.text:
(1)
105 Hamilton Avenue, east side, between Woodhull
and Summit Streets, showing the Seamen's Goodwill Mission
of the Brooklyn Church and Mission.
June 6, 1931
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
Another view of the mission and adjoining buildinga,
looking north on Hamilton Avenue from Woodhull Street.
March 27, 1937
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTICNS
(3)
The same as view 2 and showing, in addition, s
clearance to Summit Street. The buildings that were
contiguous to the mission house were demolished.
October 21, 1939
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUTTIONS
704747f-c.folder: Hamilton Avenue & Woodhull Street, Brooklyn, NY
